name: Ladrillo de Oro - Golden Brick
description:
"Ladrillo de Oro" is the spanish name of our game, translated as "Golden Brick" in english, it's a third person adventure game inspired by the most known local Legends of all Ecuador as references for the story, but seen from the perspective of Jano's adventure. Jano is the main character of the game, he is a character created specially for the story of the game, in order to take some of the most important characters from the legends, and put them together in the great new legend of Jano and The Golden Brick.

The game is driven by a sandbox-kind game, but divided in levels and a lineal story, but with the posibility to do special missions, meet goals or just wander around on each level map, I call it a semi-open world, obviously you have to meet the main goals to advance through the level and finish it, but you may take your time.
